faq.q1: Which train companies are available on RailWave?
faq.a1: You can find companies like TCDD, YHT, and Mavi Tren on RailWave.
faq.q2: How do I buy a ticket on RailWave?
faq.a2: Just select your route and date, pick a seat, and proceed to payment.
faq.a3: All transactions are SSL protected and your data is secure.
faq.q4: Do I pay any commission while buying tickets?
faq.a4: No, there are no extra charges.
faq.a5: You can cancel your ticket up to 1 hour before departure.

privacy.content:
At RailWave, we take your privacy seriously. The personal data we collect is used solely to provide you with a better experience and perform necessary operations.

Data We Collect:
- Contact details such as name, surname, email, and phone number
- Reservation and payment information
- Device and session information

Purpose of Use:
- To process and manage ticket reservations
- To provide customer support
- To fulfill legal obligations
- To improve service quality and enhance user experience

Data Security:
Your data is protected with up-to-date security technologies and all necessary measures are taken against unauthorized access.

Data Sharing:
Your personal data may be shared with third parties only when required to provide the service and in accordance with applicable laws.

User Rights:
Users have the right to access, correct, delete their data, and object to data processing activities.

For any questions regarding our privacy policy, feel free to contact us.

terms.content:
RailWave Terms of Use are outlined below:

1. Purpose of Service
Users can make train ticket reservations through this platform.

2. Membership
Users registering on the platform are responsible for providing accurate and complete information.

3. Disclaimer of Liability
RailWave is not responsible for delays or cancellations caused by third-party operators.

4. Cancellation Policy
You may cancel your ticket up to 1 hour before the scheduled departure time.

5. Intellectual Property
All content and materials on this site are the intellectual property of RailWave.
